text: Meiyou canji er anzuo jiazhong de xinshi, yu ping ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er fendou de xinshi, bici shi bu xiangdeng de. Ping ziji de caichan he shengming er fendou de ren, zhenzhu shi tamen chaoguo anzuo jiazhong de ren yiji. Zhenzhu yingxu zhe liang deng ren yao shou zui youhou de baochou. Chu anzuo zhe suo shou de baochou wai, zhenzhu jia ci fendou de ren yizhong zhongda de baochou——
